mx.org.pescadormvp.core.client.components

Class ComponentSetup

  • java.lang.Object
    • mx.org.pescadormvp.core.client.components.ComponentSetup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RegionManager, RootRegionManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActiveComponentSetup

    public abstract class ComponentSetup
extends Object
implements RootRegionManager
    Instances of this class configure the app, including specific place-activity bindings, DI bindings, and the root layout widget for viewport.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ComponentSetup.LoadingPleaseWait
      Implement this interface on a class that does something when JS scriptloading starts (like show a "please wait" message) and when it finishes (like remove the message).
      static interface  ComponentSetup.PescadorMVPGinjectorHolder
      A mini interface that allows us to pass around a specific PescadorMVPGinjector while delaying its actual instantiation.

    • Method Detail

      • startUp

        public static void startUp(ComponentSetup.PescadorMVPGinjectorHolder ginjectorHolder)
        * This method is static so we can use it before DI boots up. That way the framework to take care of booting up DI.
        Parameters:
        ginjectorHolder - A holder for the PescadorMVPGinjector to use to boot up DI.

      • loadJSthenStartUp

        public static void loadJSthenStartUp(ComponentSetup.PescadorMVPGinjectorHolder ginjectorHolder,
                     ComponentSetup.LoadingPleaseWait loadingPleaseWait,
                     boolean loadScriptsInOrder,
                     String... scriptsToLoad)

        Request the loading of scripts before the framework starts. Scripts are injected in the top window. Then the framework is started.

        This method is static so we can use it before DI boots up. That way we don't have to worry about DI bringing in Java classes that rely on external JS before it's loaded. Also allows the framework to take care of booting up DI.

        Parameters:
        ginjectorHolder - A holder for the PescadorMVPGinjector to use to boot up DI.
        loadingPleaseWait - An object that does something when scriptloading starts (like show a "please wait" message) and when it finishes (like remove the message)
        loadScriptsInOrder - If more than one script is requested, make sure they are loaded sequentially. (Some libraries need this.)
        scriptsToLoad - The URLs of scripts to load.

      • start

        public void start()

        Start up the framework: attach the layout widget to the viewport, create activity managers and attach them to the region they're concerned with, start history handling, and go to the default place (if no place is specified in the fragment identifier in the URL).

        Note that if there are scripts remaining to be injected, actual startup will be silently delayed until the scripts become available.

      • getActivityForRegionAndPlace
